Class OverlayManager

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.ui.OverlayManager
public final class OverlayManager extends Object
Coordinates start, help, pause, and game-over overlays; controls transitions, countdowns, and interaction with music and game controller.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Eashwar

    • OverlayManager

      public OverlayManager(javafx.scene.layout.Region startOverlay, javafx.scene.layout.Region helpOverlay, javafx.scene.layout.Region pauseOverlay, javafx.scene.layout.Region gameOverOverlay)
      Creates an overlay manager with references to overlay regions.
      Parameters:
      startOverlay - start screen overlay
      helpOverlay - help overlay
      pauseOverlay - pause overlay
      gameOverOverlay - game over overlay

  • Method Details

    • bindOverlayFill

      public void bindOverlayFill(javafx.scene.layout.Region overlay)
      Binds overlay size to its scene or parent pane.
      Parameters:
      overlay - overlay region to bind

    • setup

      public void setup(GuiController controller, MusicManager musicManager, DynamicStartScreen dynamicStartScreen, javafx.scene.layout.GridPane gamePanel, javafx.scene.control.Button playButton, javafx.scene.control.Button raceButton, javafx.scene.control.Button mineButton, javafx.scene.control.Button helpButton, javafx.scene.control.Button closeHelpButton, PauseOverlay pauseScreen, GameOverOverlay gameOverPanel)
      Wires overlays, buttons, and handlers; initializes visibility and music.
      Parameters:
      controller - GUI controller
      musicManager - music manager
      dynamicStartScreen - animated start screen
      gamePanel - main game grid panel
      playButton - play button
      raceButton - timed mode button
      mineButton - upside-down mode button
      helpButton - help button
      closeHelpButton - close help button
      pauseScreen - pause overlay content
      gameOverPanel - game-over overlay content
